article.name: Spiral Graph
article.description:
A test piece designed previously to the Galaxy Graph. This script generates a random number of points in a spiral, and joins them up as it goes.
The result: Pretty patterns. I guess there are many interesting and fun things you can do with the PHP image functions.
Simply [i]refresh[/i] the page to generate a new graphic.
article.keywords: image functions php graph spiral random number points line draw image png
